name: Violent Palermo
description:
Get together, the citizens of the oppressive state, and fight for your freedom!
While you might be weak alone, together, you are strong!

Your goal is to gather other civilians for a violent protest and/or uprising.

Controls:
WASD: Move
Mouse1: Shoot

I made this game in a quite short time period, as I am on a vacation of sorts. I'd love to redo a lot of the art - the buildings are colored for some reason, the post-processing makes it look like an old film, and I don't think it is near my intended game/theme.

Assets used:
lpc-submissions-merged by DeadlyEssence01
city-prop-tileset by shidky
bulletimpact_metal2 by NoiseCollector
Headshot by Pablobd
Laser shot by michael_grinnell
